overview: Turn to the left, turn to the right, open your legs - ooooh fashion! Antionio Adamo has created a movie based on the highly glamorous world of fashion. Starring Kate More as an innocent young model called Jennifer. Jennifer realises that her stunning looks are not enough to become a fashion model, she has to use her pussy and oral techniques in order to succeed. And suckceeding is the name of the game in this movie that is jam packed full of blowjobs, fucking, anal and DPs for the ultimate fashion spread!
title: Fashion
